```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
```

```{r, message = FALSE}
sheets_deauth()
training <- read_sheet("1cgP-e6THVfiW5TJ95QhX3jkNxKvc8Sicp9k_BkSRd2I")
prop_data <- training %>%
  drop_na(red) %>%
  mutate(prop = (red/(red+white))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=prop)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.04)

prop_data
```
